name: Mexican Lo-fi Crossy
description:
I have been working at making this little game in university. It's a simple Crossy Road game set in a traditional Mexican market. The protagonist is trying to cross the market to go home, and it collects coins in form of tortillas along the way.

I got inspired by some Lo-fi Mexican songs I love to hear. I included them in the game <3

I hope you enjoy it!!!

Songs by Palmasur Lo-Fi Mex

  • Lo-Fi El panadero con el pan (Lo-fi Mexicano) - Uso libre para vender pan
  • Lo-fi en la micro - Palmasur [Lofi Mexicano]
  • Lo-Fi En la fila de la Tortilleria [Lo-Fi Mexicano]
